reviewText: This Crunk Cardio Gospel DVD is by far the BEST dance fitness I've ever done.  The DJ's music along with Shauna Marie's enthusiasm places you in a dimension of praise you would never imagine to experience in a dance workout DVD.  All in the comfort of my home I can condition my body and at the same to give praise to God!  This is a must have DVD to anyone's collection of home workouts!

I absolutely LOVE Crunk Cardio Gospel with Shauna Marie!! Fitness and Worship combined!! It truly is a hiphop dance party!!
The music mix is insane too, DJ Kurious George knows exactly what hits to mix to keep the party going!! I never knew working out
